episodes.title: Escaping a Religious Cult: 27 Years in High-Control Religion ft. Born Again Atheist
episodes.description:
Born Again Atheist spent 27 years in the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) cult, averaging 14 hours a day in church and Christian school. In this powerful interview, she shares her deconstruction journey from true believer to outspoken atheist, including the shocking moment that broke her faith.

This interview reveals the devastating impact of high-control religion on women and children, the psychological manipulation of purity culture, and how religious indoctrination primes believers for conspiracy theories. Born Again Atheist now spends 6-8 hours nightly on TikTok debating "men of God" and exposing the harm caused by fundamentalist Christianity.

Follow @bornagainatheistt !
